title: Betcrypto.cr
author: Betcrypto.cr
content: Hi we are changing the reward system and we would like to have some feedback before launch the new system What kind of rewards/bonuses do you like ?Welcome bonuses , cashback , freespins etc ?or what kind of rewards would you like to see in an online casino ?Thanks

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: free-spins, no-deposit bonus, deposit bonuses with less wagering requirements..free matched bets, loyalty points..occasional chat rains, etc.also, free bonuses for carrying signatures, no campaigns ie.

comments.body: Quote from: IIrik11 on May 08, 2023, 05:09:19 AMfree-spins, no-deposit bonus, deposit bonuses with less wagering requirements..free matched bets, loyalty points..occasional chat rains, etc.also, free bonuses for carrying signatures, no campaigns ie. Cool we are thinking on doing some kind of loyalty program and give like 5% cashback on all losing bets

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Betcrypto.cr on May 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMHi we are changing the reward system and we would like to have some feedback before launch the new system What kind of rewards/bonuses do you like ?Most times, some players don't really take those bonuses serious since their accompanied with high wagering requirements, so at that if any casino most especially new casinos want to attract such players then, the offer must come with a low wager conditions just like IIrik11 mentioned in his comment. Quote from: Betcrypto.cr on May 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMWelcome bonuses , cashback , freespins etc ?or what kind of rewards would you like to see in an online casino ?Thanks All the listed bonuses systems are welcomed development a d their and easily attract new players, especially the no deposits bonuse, and you can have different conditions for different bonuses system, so the player is left with the option to choose from them which he most preferred. e.g the no deposit bonus could come with 5x wagering requirements, but a. Deposit bonus could come with a minimal wager requirement like 1x conditions, another bonus system you failed to mention but is very important also is the rakeback bonuses mechanism, this way the player gets a percentage return on the total wagered amount to continue playing with just implement this and build a good reputation and your casino is good to go. .

comments.author: Mauser
comments.body: Quote from: Betcrypto.cr on May 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMWhat kind of rewards/bonuses do you like ?Welcome bonuses , cashback , freespins etc ?A welcome bonus for new users seems like the easiest choice and should be part of any casino in today's world. When you get 100 or 200% bonus on your first deposit it's a great way to get to know the casino. Even if you are unfamiliar with a game and lose some money at first you won't feel bad about due to bonus. A high welcome bonus is also a good way for casinos to be competitive with each other. Unfortunately most of us here on the forum are regular gamblers and don't apply anymore for the welcome bonus as we have played on most of the big casinos already. That is why it would be great to get some special bonuses for recurring gamblers that are already customers at your casino. Cashback is one form of it, but that usually depends on how much money you have and how much you gamble with. Instead it would be better to have some bonuses that are independent of our bankroll. Freespins are probably the best way for that as it gives everybody the exact same opportunity.

I support cashback this is to encourage players to play more, while they targeting to level up from wagering they can still get funds from cashback, free bonuses for carrying a signature is something new, and its worth looking at this one its never been implemented, or should I say I have no idea what casinos have implemented this reward system.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Betcrypto.cr on May 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMHi we are changing the reward system and we would like to have some feedback before launch the new system What kind of rewards/bonuses do you like ?Welcome bonuses , cashback , freespins etc ?or what kind of rewards would you like to see in an online casino ?Thanks The ones not mentioned here which means,ongoing daily,weekly and monthly bonuses.Free spins I have used to play at a casino which offered the bonuses in free spins and I have no real good use of them as you may win one time and lose 99 other times when you play slot machines.The best bonus is without a doubt the monthly bonus which is usually the biggest one compared with the other bonuses as it is recurring every month as long as you are active in the casino and this bonus I decide where to play it,in slot machines or in sport betting or other games and that is why the ongoing bonuses are the best one can get.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Welcome bonuses are good to get players through the door, but I like a wager based rewards system if I plan on visiting a site for long term entertainment. It's harder for smaller sites to offer that, but that's what most people are going to like. xx % off your loss back doesn't really entice me to come lose money to you.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: I would prefer to have bonuses based on wager such as rakeback, level up rewards, or any other bonuses that I can get after I wager not bonuses that I get based on how much my deposit is, or based on how much I've lost. Free spins or welcome bonus maybe something attractive for some people but I dont like it due to its high wagering requirement. Quote from: Wiwo on May 08, 2023, 05:29:17 AMe.g the no deposit bonus could come with 5x wagering requirements, but a. Deposit bonus could come with a minimal wager requirement like 1x conditions,I have never seen any no deposit bonus or deposit bonus with such low wagering requirement. Although you mention it as example, but in fact deposit bonus and no deposit bonus are mostly using the same wagering requirement. The standard wagering requirement for no deposit bonus and deposit bonus is around 30x-50x.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Betcrypto.cr on May 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMWelcome bonuses , cashback , freespins etc ?Cashback is not a bonus.First time deposit for newly registered users, rakeback and free spins are the bonuses that I know. Another bonus that I noticed on casinos and other gambling sites are the ones that are given often, especially the ones given to the gamblers that are becoming not active. comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: The type of rewards/bonuses doesn’t matter at all because gamblers is looking on the requirements rather than the reward itself. A 1$ bonus in any form without any wagering requirements is better than a 100 bucks with high wagering requirements that is very hard to claim. Gamblers usually not interested on the bonus once the saw the requirements while some that got excited usually regret they action after seeing the requirements.Make the requirements friendly even with low amount reward. I’m sure many will be interested to participate on your promotion.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Betcrypto.cr on May 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMHi we are changing the reward system and we would like to have some feedback before launch the new system What kind of rewards/bonuses do you like ?Welcome bonuses , cashback , freespins etc ?or what kind of rewards would you like to see in an online casino ?Thanks Free bet. May be monthly 1 or 2 mBTC free bet with 1x wagering requirement. I find free bets are more attractive for me than any other promotion.For me welcome bonus is good too but if you give 30x, 15x , 10x or even 5x wagering requirement then it's a waste of time. I can accept highest 2x to wager before the bonus to become cash balance. But 1x is always preferable.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Free spins and matched bets, low-wagering requirements to activate some bonuses (highly unlikely) and some trickle of cashback for every X amount bet. These things are not always available in one casino but you can find in different ones. Cashback is what I usually would only aim for since I'm only playing to enjoy right now. It would be nice if they would be lowering the threshold to activate the cashback feature on casinos that offer these because not everyone can literally blow thousands of dollars a night on casinos as most of us playing are just average Joes.

comments.body: You already Have a good bonuses and was wondering why you are asking for another sets? or maybe you can add more in your free spins.- Loyalty Bonuses- Rakeback ( at least good percent)- Weekly or Monthly Events those will add good flavor to your site because this forum has a lots of members that loves partaking on those and gaining from what they think deserves as bonuses specially in High rollers ( and of course small bettors)

comments.body: Quote from: Reatim on May 08, 2023, 08:57:06 AMYou already Have a good bonuses and was wondering why you are asking for another sets?Their bonus is really good, until I read this rule Quote from: https://www.betcrypto.cr/bonuses/The bonus amount must be wagered 50 times before a withdrawal / payout.Although I respect with the casino for telling the truth because some casinos prefer to hide it and show if the gambler already make deposit or asking it. 50x wager requirements is almost impossible to fulfill, 30x wager requirements is already hard. I think for new casino, you need to have a promotion that's free to enter and easy to join. Maybe like predicting the score of football matches and the winner will get a free bet.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Betcrypto.cr on May 08, 2023, 04:52:11 AMHi we are changing the reward system and we would like to have some feedback before launch the new system What kind of rewards/bonuses do you like ?Welcome bonuses , cashback , freespins etc ?or what kind of rewards would you like to see in an online casino ?Thanks A poll would have been added to this discussion, so that at the end you will be able to see which of the rewards/bonuses that gamblers on this forum like the most because everyone has a preference.Since you are trying to change your reward system, and the aim definitely is to increase and attract new gamblers, it will be important to point out to you that before some gamblers choose to begin playing on a casino even with any promised reward or benefit, they first consider the terms and conditions of the bonuses and rewards offered, the withdrawal limits, wagering requirements, in some cases how long the rewards can last, and how often they will get rewards for gambling even after they sign up for the casino's.
